title: Touch
description: Nathan died the summer before his final year in high school. But he wakes in his room—or in the shrine of his room his mother’s made—confused, cold, and unable to interact with anyone or anything he sees. The only clear memory he has is a dream of a shining city and its glorious queen, but the dream fades, until he once again meets his girlfriend Emma by the side of his own grave.Nathan wants life. He wants Emma. But, even if Emma can deliver what he desires, the cost may be too high to pay...
author: Michelle Sagara
